about_the_game:
Grab a character, some battle cards, and let’s go! There are bosses to be killed, cards to be collected, awards to be earned, and friends to be “accidentally” pushed into lava! If you like co-op games, but also want to build the kickassiest deck to wow your friends, RLR is not to be missed! Oh, and it has Story mode and VS as well, so when you are tired of co-op you can delve into the story by yourself, or remove the passiveness from your aggression and duke it out in full on versus mode!

TIMED ACTION GAME

Steer your character by playing action cards. The cards might activate movement, attacks, buffs, or other effects. But the time to plan is short, and you need to act fast! You only get 30 seconds to play as many cards as you can, and you all play at the same time!

THE BIG BOT WARNED YOU

If you're cool, you avoid the enormous red fields on the ground. At the end of the round there's going to be some hurtin' here. If you're hot and angry, you take in the face and swing away! Try it out, see what's best for you.

SUPER EARLY, BARELY ACCESS, CAN’T WAIT

We are very early in development, so you’ll have to look forward to a lot of features for a while. But if you help us make this a success (by playing the demo, and engaging with us), you get to be the one who was on board from the beginning.

Right now, you can play 2 different characters with their basic decks against the robot lord

TOXIC BASTARD. You can play up to 4 players.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI 7770, Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX960+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to a arena battle game fueled by panic and humor! Fight daunting robot bosses on your couch or online with up to 4 players. Program your hero with action cards, and play nice with your friends! With 30 seconds on the clock each round, you need to be fast and tactical! Fastical!
